name: CloudSync - File Sync SaaS
summary: Professional SaaS landing page for CloudSync, a file synchronization platform. Features hero with announcement badge, social proof logos, stats showcase, detailed feature grid, customer testimonials with avatars, pricing table with multiple tiers, FAQ section, and conversion-optimized CTAs. Demonstrates modern landing page best practices with specialized components.
shortSummary: Professional SaaS landing page with hero, features, pricing, testimonials, and FAQ

header.classes: border-b sticky top-0 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-lg backdrop-saturate-150 z-50 shadow-sm

content.content: CloudSync
The file synchronization platform trusted by teams worldwide.
© 2025 CloudSync Inc. All rights reserved.

pages.title: CloudSync - Seamless File Synchronization for Modern Teams
pages.summary: CloudSync provides seamless file synchronization across all your devices with enterprise-grade security, real-time collaboration, and powerful integrations.
pages.shortSummary: Seamless file sync for modern teams

content.classes: mb-4 inline-flex items-center p-1 pr-3 bg-gray-100 rounded-full

content.content: New

content.text: Work Faster. Sync Smarter. Collaborate Better.

content.content: CloudSync keeps your team's files perfectly synchronized across every device, anywhere in the world. Real-time updates, rock-solid security, and seamless collaboration—all in one platform.
No credit card required • 14-day free trial • Cancel anytime
TRUSTED BY LEADING TEAMS
Teams worldwide
Uptime guarantee
Files synced daily
Average sync time

content.text: Everything your team needs to collaborate

content.content: From lightning-fast sync to enterprise-grade security, CloudSync has all the tools modern teams need to work together efficiently.

text.content: Files sync across all your devices in milliseconds. Our proprietary delta-sync technology means only changed portions of files are transferred.
Your data is protected with 256-bit AES encryption at rest and in transit. Zero-knowledge architecture means not even we can access your files.
Share folders instantly, set granular permissions, and see live updates as your team works. Built-in comments keep everyone in sync.
Every change is saved forever. Roll back to any previous version with one click. Perfect for compliance and audits.
Native apps for Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android. Plus web access from any browser. Your files follow you everywhere.
Connect seamlessly with Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Workspace, Salesforce, and 100+ other tools your team uses.

content.text: Loved by teams around the world

text.content: CloudSync transformed how our distributed team collaborates. File sync is instant, and we haven't had a single sync conflict since switching. The version history saved us multiple times.
We evaluated 5 different solutions and CloudSync was the clear winner. The security features are enterprise-grade, and the performance is unmatched. Migration was seamless.
The Slack integration is a game-changer. Our team can share files directly in conversations, and everything stays perfectly synced. Customer support is phenomenal too.

content.text: Plans that scale with your team

content.content: Start free, upgrade when you need more. All plans include a 14-day trial with full features.

description.content: Perfect for individuals and small teams
For large organizations with advanced needs

title.text: How does the 14-day free trial work?

text.content: You get full access to all features of your chosen plan for 14 days, no credit card required. You can cancel anytime during the trial without being charged.

title.text: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan later?

text.content: Absolutely! You can change your plan at any time from your account settings. When upgrading, you'll get immediate access to new features.

title.text: Is my data secure with CloudSync?

text.content: Security is our top priority. All files are encrypted with 256-bit AES encryption both at rest and in transit. We're SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR compliant.

title.text: What happens if I exceed my storage limit?

text.content: We'll notify you when you reach 80% of your storage limit. If you hit 100%, you can still access and download your files, but you won't be able to upload new ones.

title.text: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?

text.content: Yes! When you switch to annual billing, you save 20% compared to monthly billing. The Professional plan is $15.20/user/month when billed annually.

title.text: How easy is it to migrate from another service?

text.content: Very easy! We have migration tools that work with Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and other popular services. Most teams complete migration in less than a day.

content.classes: py-20 bg-gradient-to-r from-indigo-600 to-purple-600 text-white text-center

content.text: Ready to transform how your team works?

content.content: Join 50,000+ teams who sync faster, collaborate better, and work smarter with CloudSync. Start your free 14-day trial today—no credit card required.

content.classes: border-2 border-white text-white hover:bg-white hover:text-indigo-600 bg-white/10 transition-all
